blogger.name: Arpita Manjoka
content: I am Arpita Manjoka. I study at Delhi University. I am a writer, dancer, mental health blogger, YouTube content maker, and an aspiring psychologist! I maintain a mental health blog page and also intern under mental health foundation india (MHFI) and work as a blogger at findhope.in.
My hobbies are writing, sketching, and dancing.
I am my own kind , paving my way with a mental illness ! I wanna bring rays of hope in others life, as I feel I am the sunshine!
